parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the routing rule.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The Microservices Engine (MSE) namespace to which the application belongs.

parameters.name: NamespaceId
parameters.description: Optional. The ID of the namespace.

parameters.name: Rules
parameters.description: The details of the routing rule.
